== General Information ==

<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-devel-announce/2009-February/000536.html|"Karmic Koala"]]</nowiki> is the code name for Ubuntu 9.10, released on October 29th, 2009.  <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download|Download Karmic]]</nowiki>.

See <nowiki>[[UDSKarmic|the Ubuntu Developer Summit for Karmic]]</nowiki>, which took place from May 25th to 29th, 2009 on Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, Barcelona, Spain.

If you want to see what the developers have cooking for the Karmic release, feel free to take a look through the <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/karmic|Karmic Koala blueprint page]]</nowiki> or the <nowiki>[[TechnicalOverview|Karmic Koala Technical Overview]]</nowiki>.

<<BR>>
For for more information on the final Karmic release:
** <nowiki>[[ReleaseNotes|Karmic Release Notes]]</nowiki>
** Ubuntu 9.10 release announcement <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-announce/2009-October/000127.html|October 29, 2009]]</nowiki>

== Bugs in Karmic ==

Your comments, bug reports, patches and suggestions will help fix bugs and improve future releases. Please report bugs per the instructions on ReportingBugs.

If you want to help out with bugs, the <nowiki>[[BugSquad|Ubuntu Bug Squad]]</nowiki> is always looking for help.

== More Information ==

The next release after Karmic is codenamed LucidLynx; the <nowiki>[[Releases]]</nowiki> page contains a list of all Ubuntu releases.

You can find out more about Ubuntu on the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu website]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu wiki]]</nowiki>.

If you would like to help shape Ubuntu, please take a look at the Ubuntu <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/participate|Get Involved]]</nowiki> page.

To have future Ubuntu development announcements emailed to you, please go to the <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-devel-announce|ubuntu-devel-announce]]</nowiki> page and subscribe with your email address.

To have future Ubuntu package updates emailed to you, please go to the <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/karmic-changes|karmic-changes]]</nowiki> page and subscribe with your email address.

More Kubuntu information can also be found at <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Karmic|Kubuntuguide]]</nowiki>.
